memberdef.name: FT_UPDATE_BBOX
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ if ( p->x < bbox.xMin ) \ bbox.xMin = p->x; \ if ( p->x > bbox.xMax ) \ bbox.xMax = p->x; \ if ( p->y < bbox.yMin ) \ bbox.yMin = p->y; \ if ( p->y > bbox.yMax ) \ bbox.yMax = p->y; \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.argsstring: (FT_Pos y1, FT_Pos y2, FT_Pos y3, FT_Pos *min, FT_Pos *max)
memberdef.name: BBox_Conic_Check

memberdef.argsstring: (FT_Pos q1, FT_Pos q2, FT_Pos q3, FT_Pos q4)
memberdef.name: cubic_peak

memberdef.argsstring: (FT_Pos p1, FT_Pos p2, FT_Pos p3, FT_Pos p4, FT_Pos *min, FT_Pos *max)
memberdef.name: BBox_Cubic_Check
